name: BallLead
description:
BallLead is an unique hyper casual game where you can challenge yourself to goal as much you can within 60 seconds. There is a catch. You have to make sure that once you make your first goal, That Portal NET become your home NET and all your subsequent goal should be on the same NET.  So How it implies the Brackeys GameJame theme??? Once the 1st goal is made all the rest of balls will follow  together the 1st ball's lead, if they not, they will fail. The more you goal, the more score you will gain. So what are you waiting for. Lead the Ball, Remember Unity is Strength.

Important Note: This is Pre-Alpha .Its only on conceptual stage. By this release we portrays the gameplay. Hope you guys' will like it.
